title: Litro & Laugfs suspend operations as gas shipments were not received
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas and Laugfs Gas have announced that the production and distribution process of domestic gas was suspended as they did not receive gas consignments to commence production.
At the same time, people were seen waiting outside distribution centers anticipating the arrival of gas trucks to purchase domestic gas cylinders.
Litro & Laugfs suspend operations as gas shipments were not received
